name: Web3 Fintech App UI Design
description:
Hey Guys,


Okay so, we all know how that Web3 and the Blockchain is taking over the world.


Well, I decided to work towards that area and I created a Fintech Web3 App. I had a lot of fun creating this UI from the Designs, to the Mockups, and then to the Presentations.


I have decided to share this with you guys.


Any feedback for me? Let me have them in the comments.


Also, do check me out on Dribbble for more inspiration: https://www.dribbble.com/designspree


Instagram for more inspiration: https://www.instagram.com/design.spree


P.S: Its my first time publishing on the Figma Community.
